# About ActionTxt Demo
This demo site exposes safe, auditable actions for AI agents. It implements read-only and transactional examples with OAuth2 scopes, rate limits, idempotency, and optional human review.

## Key Docs
- API: /openapi.json
- Terms: https://demo.actiontxt.org/terms
- Privacy: https://demo.actiontxt.org/privacy

## Actions
For machine-readable actions, see:
- /.well-known/agent.json
